songs.title: Oceans
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wait for your call, love
The call never came
Ready to fall up
Ready to claim
I'm ready for it all, love
Ready for the pain
Meet under sun and
Meet me again
In the rain
In the rain
In the rain
The rain

[Verse 2]
Behind the walls, love
I'm trying to change
And I'm ready for it all, love
I'm ready for the change
Meet me in blue sky
Meet me again
In the rain
The rain, the rain
The rain, the rain

[Outro]
Got to find yourself alone in this world
To find yourself alone

[Instrumental]
